channel.title: Making extra character-xxx = 0 in character.txt files
channel.description:
does anyone know how to add an extra character-XXXX = 0 in the character files?
i want to make 10 new ones for my server!
character-reborn = 0 character-strbonus = 0 character-potbonus = 0 character-foodbonus = 0 character-magebonus = 0 character-bonusspecial = 0 character-prayerbonus = 0 character-defencebonus = 0 character-rangebonus = 0 character-attackbonus = 0
i want to add these into the character's file so i can have a stat point server, can anyone help?
